amendment.description: To provide equitable treatment for children's hospitals.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1088 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1088 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S8538-8539; text: CR S8539) To provide equitable treatment for children's hospitals.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1088 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Mikulski.
